name: Crooked Casino
description:
This is a game developed in 48 hours by a team of four students for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, with the theme of "Roll of the Dice".

As an Enforcer at the Crooked Casino, you've noticed a recent uptick in cheating, suspected to be carried out using weighted dice. Your new task is to pick out the cheater at each table.  

Can you catch the cheaters, or will the Crooked Casino be bled dry right under your nose?

Find out now in: Crooked Casino!

Credits:

  • Zachary Maizes - Project Manager, Lead Programmer
  • Angelinne Mendenhall - Lead Artist
  • Jefferson LeVasseur - Sound Designer
  • Sam Isenberg - Programmer
